question: There are two pumps to fill a tank with water. First pump can fill the empty tank in 8 hours, while the second in 10 hours, If both the pumps are opened at the same time and kept open for 4 hours, the part of the tank that will be filled up is :
explanation:
Part of the tank filled in an hour by both pumps
$latex = \\frac{1}{8}+\\frac{1}{10} = \\frac{5+4}{40} = \\frac{9}{40}&s=1$
âˆ´ Part of the tank filled in 4 hours
$latex = \\frac{4\\times 9}{40} = \\frac{9}{10}&s=1$
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
